TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TransactionProtocol extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies the transaction protocol used in flowing transactions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used together with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> class to specify the desired protocol for flowing transactions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As TransactionProtocol
public: static property System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ Default { System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the default value for the transaction protocol.
Docs.value: A valid value that specifies the default transaction protocol to be used in flowing a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information on selecting a transaction protocol, see [Enabling Transaction Flow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/31a6bc6a-4ef4-45ba-a753-1efa1a19d917).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OleTransactions As TransactionProtocol
public: static property System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ OleTransactions { System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the OleTransactions transaction protocol value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The OleTransactions protocol is useful for scenarios when interoperability with third-party protocol stacks is not a requirement, and the deployer of a service knows in advance that WS-AtomicTransaction is disabled locally or that the existing network topology does not favor the usage of WS-AtomicTransaction.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WSAtomicTransaction11 As TransactionProtocol
public: static property System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ WSAtomicTransaction11 { System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the WSAtomicTransaction11 transaction protocol value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004 As TransactionProtocol
public: static property System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004 { System::ServiceModel::TransactionProtocol ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004 transaction protocol value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The WS-AtomicTransaction protocol is useful for scenarios when interoperability with third-party protocol stacks is a requirement. It is also useful as a simple mechanism for testing transaction flow and the two-phase commit protocol using the WS-AT protocol, without interference with the OleTransactions protocol.
